member.name: T:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessContextExtensions
member.summary: Contains .Net 4.0 specific extensions methods for OpenAccessContext type

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessContextExtensions.CreateDynamicInstance(Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessContext,Telerik.OpenAccess.Metadata.MetaPersistentType)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the specified persistent type. Returns the instance as Dynamic
member.remarks: The new entity instance is not added to the context. Before using SetFieldValue or FieldValue methods make sure the object is added to an OpenAccessContext
member.param: Context instance that contains the metadata for the specified persistent type
Type of the entity that is to be created
member.returns: New entity instance of the specified type exposed as dynamic

member.name: M:Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessContextExtensions.CreateDynamicInstance(Telerik.OpenAccess.OpenAccessContext,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the specified persistent type. Returns the instance as Dynamic
member.remarks: The new entity instance is not added to the context. Before using SetFieldValue or FieldValue methods make sure the object is added to an OpenAccessContext
member.param: Context instance that contains the metadata for the specified persistent type
Full type name of the entity that is to be created
member.returns: New entity instance of the specified type exposed as dynamic
